name: The Liar (kalouwen)
description:
They say lies never sail far. But they also say that it hurts to tell the truth.

Would you embrace falsehood when knowing the truth would hurt you?

A lie is not necessarily wrong, and the truth is not always appropriate to tell.

The Liar is a world of truth and lies made up of 2D black and white images. The player becomes an insightful cat who walks between the two paths to find its true heart.
